name: Ruins of the Future
description:
After years of training you have finally made it to your last solo training exercise to become a time traveler! You must traverse each landscape using the dice which will decide your fate... 

Make it through the time machine at the end of each stage to slowly travel into the future as the ruins slowly crumble, and soon you will be met with your new life of time travel!

Created by Mayday (coding and mechanics), Rin (all artwork), and Cecily (epic music)

Zoom out for best results.
